title: DDFP 240: Free agency & 'True Detective' reaction
itunes:title: DDFP 240: Free agency & 'True Detective' reaction
description:
Shek is joined by former New England Patriots Willie McGinest and Deion Branch to discuss the Darrelle Revis signing and the surprising underachievement of Bill Belichick's coaching disciples. Then, Handsome Hank and @NFL_ATL's Dan Hanzus break down more free agency news before discussing the "True Detective" season finale (*Spoiler Alert* from 41:33 to 1:02:30). Lastly, stay tuned for a snippet of Dameshek's interview with "Breaking Bad" star Aaron Paul. You can watch the full interview at NFL.com/Shek. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
